Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory671.jpg'}
{3: 'As you venture deeper into the rest area, a familiar melody fills the airâ€”Delibes\' "Sylvia-Pizzicato".'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory637.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory637.jpg'}
{1: '1', 3: 'And there, on a makeshift stage, stands Bambinata, performing a graceful ballet routine.'}
{3: 'Bambinata twirls like a porcelain doll, her blue and white dress swirling around her.'}
{3: "So lost in the music, she doesn't hear you approach."}
{2: 'Bambinata', 3: 'C-Commandant!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She stops mid-twirl, her small frame trembling slightly.'}
{2: 'You dance beautifully.', 3: '15'}
{2: 'Bambinata', 3: 'Commandant! Did Bambinata scare you? Oh, sorry! Bambinata just got drawn in by the music...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bambinata', 3: "Bambinata's body kind of started moving on its own.", 4: '1'}
{2: "How'd you end up here?", 3: '19'}
{2: 'Bambinata', 3: 'Bambinata got lost, and now Bambinata is waiting for Mistress here.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bambinata', 3: 'Commandant, are you mad at Bambinata?', 4: '1'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{2: 'Not at all, you danced beautifully.', 3: '23'}
{2: 'It was a privilege to watch.', 3: '24'}
{2: 'Bambinata', 3: 'Thank you, Commandant.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Can you keep dancing?', 3: '26'}
{2: 'Bambinata', 3: 'Is it, uh, alright if Bambinata dances in front of you, Commandant?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bambinata', 3: "But if it's coming straight from you, Commandant, Bambinata will go along with it.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bambinata', 3: "Alright then, it's time to start dancing.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Bambinata rises on her tiptoes, her arms reaching out like a flower about to open.'}
{3: 'Her steps are light and quick, each movement strong and graceful.'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{2: 'Seeing you dance is the best Double Seventh gift ever, Bambinata.', 3: '36'}
{2: 'Bambinata', 3: "Valentine's Day? What's that?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bambinata', 3: 'Please allow Bambinata to check the backup database.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bambinata', 3: "Oh, so that's what it is.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bambinata', 3: 'Do you mean, Commandant...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bambinata', 3: 'No, maybe Bambinata misunderstood.', 4: '1'}
{2: "You didn't misunderstand, Bambinata.", 3: '44'}
{2: 'Bambinata', 3: 'Huh? That means...', 4: '1'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{2: '(Pull out a mini speaker)', 3: '48'}
{2: "Here's a little something back, Bambinata.", 3: '49'}
{2: 'You can play music whenever the mood strikes.', 3: '50'}
{2: 'Bambinata', 3: 'A-a music box?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bambinata', 3: "Bambinata... never imagined she'd lay hands on something so valuable.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bambinata', 3: 'Thank you for this lovely gift, Commandant. Bambinata will cherish it.', 4: '1'}
{2: "I can't wait to see more of your dancing, Bambinata.", 3: '55'}
{2: 'Bambinata', 3: "Of course, Commandant, if it's an order...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bambinata', 3: 'Bambinata is always happy to perform for you, anytime.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Well, you have to enjoy it too, Bambinata.', 3: '58'}
{2: 'Bambinata', 3: 'Bambinata doesn\'t quite understand "enjoy." Ballet is more familiar to Bambinata.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bambinata', 3: 'But if it makes you happy, Commandant, maybe Bambinata will learn to enjoy.', 4: '1'}
